snippet.title: Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn Official Trailer (2017)
snippet.description:
Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn (2017) Game
© 2017 - Angry Demon Studio
#UnforgivingANH

Finding yourself in the lost Swedish woods, can you survive the stories we all thought were make-belief to scare little children?

The various settings of Unforgiving are based on the Swedish folklore with all its vicious creatures and stories, joined with the magic of Nordic mythology.

Find the full game on STEAM November 24 - 2017

Visit our homepage for more information and screenshots:
http://unforgivinggame.com/
